You need only do the section for your own project data

## 🐸 Frog development

🎬 Open your `frogs-88H` Project. Make a new script, `cont-fgf-s20.R`, and,
using `cont-fgf-s30.R` as a template, repeat the analysis stage 20. 

## 🎄 *Arabidopisis*

🎬 Open your `arab-88H` Project. Make a new script, `suff-def-spl7.R`, and, 
using `suff-def-wild.R` as a template, repeat the analysis on the *spl7* 
mutants. 



## 💉 *Leishmania*

🎬 Open your `leish-88H` Project. Make a new script, `pro_ama.R`, and, 
using `pro_meta.R` as a template, repeat the analysis on the 
procyclic promastigotes (pro) and amastigotes (ama). 


## 🐭 Stem cells

🎬 Open your `mice-88H` Project. Make a new script and, using 
`hspc-prog.R` as a template, repeat the analysis on the 
HSPC and LT-HSC cells.
